descriptionHtml:
[center][b][u]
Mods Used:[/u][/b]

[b][/b][font=Courier New][size=3][b][/b][/size][/font][size=3][b]SG Brows[/b][font=Arial] - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327[/font]

[b]KS Hairdos[/b][font=Arial] - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/[/font]

[b]Mature Skin [/b][font=Arial]- https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/ [/font]

[font=Arial](..which was found in.. 
[/font][b]Demoniac -[/b] https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70834/[/size][b] [/b][font=Arial])[/font][/center][center][size=3]
[b][font=Arial]The Witcher 3 Eyes - [/font][/b][font=Arial]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79622[/font]
[/size][size=3]
[b]YMMP (not on Nexus, so manual install.) [/b]- https://yevvieart.com/workshop/modding/yevmods-files/[/size]
[size=3][/size]

[/center]

[center][size=3]these mods, and a lot of others I use, are amazing. Thanks to their creators for being awesome and talented. 
[u]
[color=#ea9999]If I missed some, do let me know![/color]
[/u][/size]


[font=Arial][b][u]If you have a neck seam:[/u]
[/b][/font]
- go on console commands

- click on Astrid 

- Type 'setnpcweight 80'

- face will probably look odd, but just type 'disable'..

- then enable. 

If this doesn't work, I'm not sure what will. Not particularly a modding expert.

[color=#e06666][b]IF THIS FACE CHANGES ANYTHING EXCEPT [/b][u]ASTRID[/u][/color][b][color=#e06666]'S FACE, UN-INSTALL THIS MOD IMMEDIATELY.
[/color][/b]
[color=#e06666]Again, not a modding expert, so I don't know what I'm doing. It's a miracle I even made a mod. lol.[/color]

ENB USED IN SCREENSHOTS IS: Rudy ENB but with Bokeh Blur and Vivid Weathers. Sunsprite files from Mellon-Vana Fantasy ENB.[/center]
author: Rei
